body:
June 22: In Any World (Chapter 12)

Explicit

Tags: Alternative Universes, universe hopping, friends to lovers, fanfiction, getting together

Summary:  Returning home after his second world tour, Dan feels lost, bored, and without direction. But things are about to get much more exciting when, while reading fanfiction in the bath,  Dan slips, hits his head, and passes out. When he wakes up, it’s to a world that definitely isn’t the one he came from, especially because his best friend is in bed with him. And if he thinks that is strange, things are about to get a whole lot weirder.

Tags for this chapter: body swapping, weddings, outside pov

Start from the beginning ¦ Read on ao3

I’m posting a fic (or chapter of a fic) every day in June 2019 here is a list of them. Here are the ones I did in June 2018 and here are the ones I did in June 2017

!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

question: top 5 sims episode?
answer:
aw hun, I was trying to answer this properly but between packing, babysitting and visiting people i can’t find 15 minutes in a row lmao

basically,

I have always adored the sims series. It gives so many intimate domestic insights and banter because it’s dan and phil vicariously living through their sims and i love picking up pieces and hints of their personal preferences left there, ex in home decor, parenting, young dnp nostalgia etc

My personal favorite are the first two, because they were literally trying to make their child without it being too obvious lol and how Phil was re-watching it when dan was away :( <3 like ow

Also the dab and evan date one omg it was so very reflective of them and of early dnp ugh it’s v cute. 

Basically, I’d like to do a full length sims marathon when the series fully ends properly (i need a gay wedding ok?) and i’d like to come back to you then :p

title: friday night placebo
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/31OvoGJ

by kishere

Phil Lester never thought that he was going to be here in his life: successful, healthy, a little lonely, and helping produce his own Netflix show. Dan Howell, YouTube fanboy and food aficionado, just wants to get a job in television acting. One audition could help both of their problems.

!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)
